Title: Oliver
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), William L. Rotko, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Chuku Modu
Plot: Claire learns to communicate with Shaun as they must race to the hospital with a donated organ.
